about_the_game:
Monster Battle, this is a backpack management auto-battle chess game
In this game, you can buy various monsters from the store and deploy them onto the field, then battle against other players!
  • Strategic Construction
You will summon various different monsters to fight for you, so the choice of monsters is crucial!
  • Collect Monsters
Monsters will have different races, shapes, sizes, and rarity. The correct combination and distribution of them are the key to enhancing combat power!
  • Fusion Evolution
Some monsters can merge and evolve with each other through contact, giving birth to more powerful monsters!
  • Player Duel
The enemies in the game will be the monster choices and combinations of real players. Do your best to defeat them! The ranking mode will display the strength ranking of all players.
  • Hero Skills
The game has added characters of different professions, each with their own unique combat style! Choose your favorite character to start fighting!
Welcome to add the game to your wish list!
